svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Total renewable energy consumption over the long-term, measured in terawatt-hours (TWh) per year. Traditional
biofuels refer to the consumption of fuelwood, forestry products, animal and agricultural wastes.
Source: Global Energy Production by Source - Vaclav Smil (2017), BP Statistical Review of Global Energy
